description.attr1: Replaces ship's standard ammo with ammo specialized to injure and hurt crew.
Optimized to penetrate hull, when the ammo detects an open space it explodes sending shrapnel in all directions.
Although the chance is low, some of this shrapnel might hit the crew, resulting in injury and even death.
This ammo is frequently used during ship capture operations, in the hope of eliminating some of the defenders.
